p.n: The Bridge On The River Kwai
p.k: 81% William Holden and Alec Guinness star as British POWs charged with building a bridge that their own side want to obliterate
77% Five oddball criminals rent rooms from a suspicious octogenarian landlady to plot their latest heist. Oscar-nominated crime comedy with Alec Guinness and Peter Sellers
82% David Lean's multiple Oscar-winning classic stars Peter O'Toole as the young lieutenant uniting Arab tribes for war. With Alec Guinness and Omar Sharif
65% Helen Hunt and the late Bill Paxton star in this FX-filled action movie about rival teams of scientists competing to investigate a series of destructive tornadoes
78% Cops Simon Pegg and Nick Frost investigate a series of deaths in a quiet English village. Action comedy directed by Edgar Wright
76% Future cop Tom Cruise goes on the run for a murder he's yet to commit in Spielberg's dazzling sci-fi thriller. With Colin Farrell
One of the last people on an evacuated Earth finds himself battling to save mankind
